author: rkeithhill
body:
Steps to reproduce
------------------

```powershell
# From an elevated console run - honestly, why isn't help just installed with PS Core??
Update-Help 
Get-Help iwr -full # examine the parameters - all text is nicely aligned
Get-Help iwr -full | more # examine the parameters and formatting is off
```
Here are the two cases:
Expected behavior (this is what I get when not piping to more.com):
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5177512/37257325-d745a1e6-252d-11e8-8041-15dafdff0c28.png)

Actual behavior (when `| more` used):
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5177512/37257340-f671ba50-252d-11e8-8008-819c3470a547.png)

Environment data
----------------

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```powershell
> $PSVersionTable
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      6.0.1
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    v6.0.1
OS                             Microsoft Windows 10.0.16299
Platform                       Win32NT
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0
```
title: Get-Help formatting messed up when piped through more.com
